name: Frog²
description:
Frogs² - Stack box shaped frogs to get to the yummy bees!

Help Froghilde and her Frog Family to get to Beetram, the yummy bee. Hop, Jump and use the power of Frog to the power of 2!

Aim with WASD.

Jump with Space.

Hold Space for higher jumps.

Click on Froghilde to spawn more frogs.

Made for Mini Jam 106: Frogs² using the following tools:

Unity 2020.3.11 Personal, Aseprite, Guitar Pro 5, Magix Music Maker, sfxr

Font used: Baloo Tammudu 2
